BasicInfo.short: Pinger is a proprietary, cross-platform texting and calling app for smartphones that lets its users text and talk free with the other users.

Products.name: Textfree
Products.description: Textfree allows users to send unlimited free texts from an iPod touch or iPhone to any US mobile phone.

Products.name: POP messenger
Products.description: POP messenger is an application that enables its users to customize their texts with fonts, colors, and background images from the web.
